languages.text: "Едва ли глава друзианцев откажет кардиналу в его необычной просьбе. Однако, это произойдет уже вне нашей юрисдикции, а отец Иеронимус отметит ваше высокое доверие в вопросах веры".

"The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли глава друзианцев откажет кардиналу в его необычной просьбе. Однако, это произойдет уже вне нашей юрисдикции, а отец Иеронимус отметит ваше высокое доверие в вопросах веры".

traits.locale_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

"The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

"The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

languages.text: "Das Oberhaupt der Drusianer würde die Anfrage des Kardinals wohl kaum ablehnen. Allerdings liegt die Angelegenheit außerhalb unserer Jurisdiktion und Reverend Hieronymus wird Euer Vertrauen, das Ihr in Glaubensfragen in ihn setzt, gewiss zu schätzen wissen."
languages.original_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Das Oberhaupt der Drusianer würde die Anfrage des Kardinals wohl kaum ablehnen. Allerdings liegt die Angelegenheit außerhalb unserer Jurisdiktion und Reverend Hieronymus wird Euer Vertrauen, das Ihr in Glaubensfragen in ihn setzt, gewiss zu schätzen wissen."

languages.text: « Je doute fort que le chef des Drusiens refuse d'accéder à la singulière requête du cardinal. Cependant, le cas échéant, l'affaire ne relèvera plus de notre juridiction, et le révérend Hiéronymus appréciera la confiance que vous lui témoignez en matière de religion. »
languages.original_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute fort que le chef des Drusiens refuse d'accéder à la singulière requête du cardinal. Cependant, le cas échéant, l'affaire ne relèvera plus de notre juridiction, et le révérend Hiéronymus appréciera la confiance que vous lui témoignez en matière de religion. »

languages.text: “德鲁苏斯教派的首领应该不会拒绝主教大人的特殊要求，不过，到了那个时候，这件事情就不在我们的管辖范围内了。相信希罗尼穆斯牧师会非常感激您在信仰方面对他的信任。”
languages.original_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

traits.locale_text: “德鲁苏斯教派的首领应该不会拒绝主教大人的特殊要求，不过，到了那个时候，这件事情就不在我们的管辖范围内了。相信希罗尼穆斯牧师会非常感激您在信仰方面对他的信任。”

languages.text: «El líder de los drusianos no denegaría la solicitud del cardenal, por peculiar que sea. Eso apartaría el caso de nuestra jurisdicción, y el reverendo Hieronymus agradecerá la confianza que deposita en él en asuntos de fe».
languages.original_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

traits.locale_text: «El líder de los drusianos no denegaría la solicitud del cardenal, por peculiar que sea. Eso apartaría el caso de nuestra jurisdicción, y el reverendo Hieronymus agradecerá la confianza que deposita en él en asuntos de fe».

languages.text: 「ドルシアンの長が枢機卿の奇妙な願いを否定することはまずないでしょう。しかし、その時点でこの件は私たちの管轄外となります。信仰の問題に関しては、あなたが彼に対して抱く高い信頼をヒエロニムス司祭も理解することでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

traits.locale_text: 「ドルシアンの長が枢機卿の奇妙な願いを否定することはまずないでしょう。しかし、その時点でこの件は私たちの管轄外となります。信仰の問題に関しては、あなたが彼に対して抱く高い信頼をヒエロニムス司祭も理解することでしょう」

languages.text: "Drususçuların lideri, kardinalin isteğini geri çevirmeyecektir. Ancak mesele, o noktadan sonra bizim yetki alanımızın dışında kalır. Muhterem Hieronymus, inanç mevzularında ona gösterdiğiniz itimadı takdirle karşılayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The head of the Drusians would hardly deny the cardinal's peculiar request. However, the matter will be outside our jurisdiction at that point, and Reverend Hieronymus will appreciate your high trust in him when it comes to questions of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Drususçuların lideri, kardinalin isteğini geri çevirmeyecektir. Ancak mesele, o noktadan sonra bizim yetki alanımızın dışında kalır. Muhterem Hieronymus, inanç mevzularında ona gösterdiğiniz itimadı takdirle karşılayacaktır."
